tag_list: music, tech, digital, social-media, connector, events, rootmusic, bandpage, root-music, band-page
overview:
Sam Salisbury is the Director of Artist Relations for RootMusic, creator of BandPage, the #1 music application on Facebook. Sam has led the charge to adopt over 500,000 bands/artists/musicians to the BandPage platform and continues to provide meaningful value by strategizing digital campaigns for some of the largest musicians in the business.

Prior to RootMusic, Sam has worked in collaborative promotion with NBC Sports, All-American Rejects, Jay-Z, AT&T, Skullcandy and has produced/promoted successful events including: the The Fray, OneRepublic, Paramore, 311, Dashboard Confessional, Third Eye Blind, and Snoop Dogg. Perhaps, Sam’s greatest feat is bringing together old school legends MC Hammer and Vanilla Ice for an epic one night show in SLC, Utah.

Sam Loves Life!
